introduction.name: Edgar Leung
introduction.title: Software Developer
introduction.summary: I’m Edgar Leung, a Full Stack Developer from Toronto. I specialize in building user-focused, scalable web applications. Whether working on the front-end or back-end, I approach every project with resilience and a problem-solving mindset, always ready to tackle new challenges and deliver results.
introduction.More:
My journey into coding started in high school robotics, where I realized the power of technology to solve real-world problems. A pivotal moment came during Army bootcamp when a friend—a philosophy major—asked me to create a portfolio website for them. Juggling rigorous training schedules, I couldn’t deliver on the promise, but that experience left me with a realization: I wanted to create meaningful applications that help others achieve their goals. Since then, my determination has driven me to continually grow as a developer, adapting to new tools and challenges.
Outside of development, I enjoy cycling long distances, hiking, and diving into strategic games like Warhammer. These activities fuel my creativity and help me approach problems with resilience. As I continue to grow in my career, I’m focused on creating solutions that not only meet business needs but also make a lasting impact.

workExperience.title: Web Developer
workExperience.description: Developed a mobile and web application for HVAC/R specialists to streamline inventory management and paperwork, incorporating QR scanning and seamless webflow integration. Collaborated effectively with technical and non-technical teams to design and implement new features with precision.

workExperience.title: Web Developer intern
workExperience.description: Redesigned the merge queue tool for the Internet Archives to improve librarian accessibility and streamline author/work merges. Implemented Figma designs to enhance user interface efficiency and usability during remote collaboration.

workExperience.title: Web Developer Student
workExperience.description: Collaborated effectively in teams to complete various web development projects, focusing on both software design and implementation. Gained a strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and algorithms through coursework and practical applications. Volunteered for multiple initiatives, primarily focused on data analytics, to support research projects and enhance data-driven decision-making processes.

projects.name: Getogether
projects.description: Getogether is a dynamic application designed for creating and sharing events, drawing inspiration from the functionality of platforms like Meetup. The primary objective is to provide users with a seamless experience for organizing and discovering events in their community.

projects.name: Warhammer Portfolio
projects.description: A blog website for showcasing all my Warhammer Figurines and for contacts for painting commisions. A long time hobbiest, I have done paint commisions in the past and have painted miniatures that I wish to display.
